bio:
We are an end-to-end engineering service provider to the global industry. Our service portfolio includes Concept designing, Reverse Engineering, CAD CAM Services, Paper to CAD Conversion, 2D to 3D CAD conversion, Design & Development of system – sub system, Validation , Tooling , Part sourcing & Manufacturing support.

We are using CADWorx, UNIGRAPHICS 3D CAD software and 2D AUTOCAD software and can provide you accurate drawings & models in acceptable formats.

Our standard terms and conditions:

1. Award us the project.
2. Fund 50% amount.
3. Release 50% of the amount.
4. Provide your email Id (We will activate your account on the project portal and our creative team will communicate with you directly in the execution of the project).
5. Final 50% payment before the delivery of Source files.

abstrac: Not just Web Designing. Its Web Engineering
bio: We are Web Diligent; an India (Kolkata, West Bengal) based professional offshore Website Designing & Development Service agency. Presently we are serving clients from the United States, Great Britain, Middle East, Australia, New Zealand, European and Asian Nations. Our objective is to maintain long term friendly business ties with clients by providing high-end web services and solutions.  We are also specialized in J Query and HTML/XHTML web design, Shopping cart design/development for Ecommerce website development, Custom Administration (Admin) Panel and much more. Apart from custom website development service, we also offer Professional Graphic Designing Services. We named it Corporate Identity and Branding Service. The services we offer here are Logo/Illustration Design, Email Newsletter design, creative brochure design to clients, Flash/Animated Logo Design, Business card design, E Book design and corporate presentation.
We never ask for any upfront payment release. Payment is strictly as per milestones or cost break-ups that are agreed from both end. We prefer payment from Guru Safe Pay.
